testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: We’ve worked with dozens of amazing people

list.body: Stéphane listened to my needs and turned them into a website that truly reflects me. It’s reassuring to entrust your image to someone so human and competent.
list.alt: reassured and smiling face of Claire Dubois

list.body: Thanks to his support, my website now has real visibility on Google. Most importantly, I understood what I was doing and why. A big thank you.
list.alt: happy SEO client Julien Mallet

list.body: From design to ergonomics, everything flows. My clients often say how clear and pleasant my site is. It’s exactly what I wanted.
list.alt: satisfied user of the site's clarity, Marion Ternier

list.body: I didn’t know where to start. Stéphane structured everything, explained it all with patience and kindness. The result: a professional, visible, and easy-to-manage website.
list.alt: reassured entrepreneur portrait of Loïc Henrot

list.body: It’s more than just a website. It’s a true showcase that tells my story. Thank you for the precision, attention to detail, and reassuring support.
list.alt: professional portrait of Emilie Marchand, founder

list.body: The SEO strategy quickly improved my visibility. I finally feel aligned with my website — and my clients feel it too.
list.alt: confident gaze of Ismaël Fournier after SEO

list.body: Stéphane helped me turn a vague idea into a concrete, coherent, and visible project. He has a gift for translating intuition into elegant pixels.
list.alt: inspired testimonial from Céline Lefèvre

list.body: I was afraid creating a site would be complicated. With Stéphane, everything was clear, fluid, and reassuring. He grasped my world from the first meeting.
list.alt: relieved expression of Mathilde Vernet after site creation

list.body: He didn’t just build a site — he created a digital cocoon where I feel 100% myself. Thank you for your kindness and attentive listening.
list.alt: kind portrait of Anne-Laure Simon

list.body: Every step was guided, explained, and respected. I’ve never experienced such quality service — calm and professional throughout.
list.alt: reassured and satisfied client, Michel Degryse

list.body: I never imagined the experience could be so human. Stéphane highlighted my activity with rare accuracy.
list.alt: touched expression of Lætitia Giraud

list.body: Beyond his expertise, Stéphane gave me back my confidence. Today, my website reflects who I am and I’m proud to show it.
list.alt: smiling portrait of Mélanie Borel

list.body: Stéphane helped me structure my scattered ideas. He gave my project a soul — with respect, intuition, and talent.
list.alt: inspired portrait of Mélanie Borel

list.body: The website speaks for me. It’s beautiful, clear, and engaging — but above all, it was created with heart. And it shows.
list.alt: warm portrait of Héloïse Martin

list.body: I loved the creation process. Stéphane blends structure with flexibility, listening with guidance. It’s rare and valuable.
list.alt: relaxed and satisfied expression of Baptiste Ferron

list.body: He didn’t just create a site — he understood my activity, my message, and translated it with finesse. Thank you infinitely.
list.alt: expressive portrait of Camille Rolin

list.body: I’m amazed by how simple my site is to use. Stéphane thinks of everything, even for people who know nothing about tech.
list.alt: confident smile from Sarah Pichon

list.body: Everything was smooth — from first contact to launch. It’s rare to feel this well supported.
list.alt: relaxed photo of Romain Brasseur

list.body: He translated my activity into a site that’s clear, beautiful, and effective. I feel completely aligned with this new tool.
list.alt: solo entrepreneur portrait of Alix Bonnel

list.body: The SEO strategy was built with clarity and transparency. And the results are there. Thanks for the precious teaching.
list.alt: bright-eyed independent Hugo Rivière

list.body: I recommend Stéphane with complete trust. For his sensitivity, his talent, and his ability to give life to your project.
list.alt: sincere portrait of Anaïs Leroy

list.body: Before, my site was invisible. In just a few months, I saw a real difference on Google. Stéphane explained every step clearly.
list.alt: confident client after first SEO results, Julie Marin

list.body: Stéphane doesn’t just do SEO — he builds a tailored strategy. I regained clarity in my message and more qualified traffic.
list.alt: satisfied expression of Sébastien Collet after SEO

list.body: I didn’t understand SEO at all. Now I know how my site works, why it ranks better, and how to sustain it.
list.alt: serene portrait of Florence Billon, entrepreneur

list.body: SEO is no longer a blurry word. Thanks to Stéphane, I have an optimized website that attracts the right clients.
list.alt: confident client about his SEO visibility, Quentin V.

list.body: He combined beauty and performance. My site is as attractive as it is well referenced. Organic traffic doubled in two months.
list.alt: radiant founder after SEO audit, Alice Menier

list.body: SEO was just a word to me. Now, it brings me clients every week. And I feel confident managing it on my own.
list.alt: bright portrait of Maxime Treillet, freelancer

stephaneHero.title: Who am I?
lines: Software engineer & passionate full-stack web developer.
I hold a CEC7 (Master in Software Engineering).
I design elegant, high-performance, long-lasting websites.
My approach: combining technology with visual sensitivity, SEO with user experience. Each project is a human adventure above all.

metadata.title: Who am I? – Stéphane Gamot, engineer & web developer
metadata.description: Full-stack developer & freelance SEO consultant. Passionate about web design, accessibility, UX, and technical optimization.
metadata.ogTitle: Stéphane Gamot – Creator of web & SEO solutions
metadata.ogDescription: My background, values, and skills. A human, technical, and aesthetic approach to your website.

about.philosophyText: I offer each client a tailored solution, a digital presence that reflects them, and strong foundations for lasting visibility.
about.philosophySmallText:
Precision, clarity, listening, and knowledge-sharing are the pillars of my way of working.
My goal is for your website to become a true asset — not just a tool.
about.ctaTitle: Shall we build your project together?
about.ctaText: Let’s take a few minutes to talk about it calmly.

timeline.text: First web development projects using Joomla and WordPress.
Learned the solid foundations of the web with HTML and CSS, establishing structured and clean code.
Deepened knowledge of modern JavaScript and started SEO-focused projects to improve site visibility.
Adopted React and integrated accessibility principles for more inclusive interfaces.
Explored Next.js to combine performance, SEO, and robust server-side architecture.
Used Bootstrap and later Tailwind CSS to create elegant, coherent, and responsive interfaces.
Integrated Git for versioning and set up front-end testing with Jasmine.
Advanced back-end development with Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, and deployment via CI/CD pipelines.
Strategic SEO support, advanced accessibility, and custom web design.

portfolio.title: Project showcase
portfolio.text: Discover some of the custom projects I’ve designed — where refined design meets performance and visibility.

recipe-blog.alt: Cozy cooking blog with a family-friendly atmosphere.

bistronomic-restaurant.description: An immersive and tasty design with an interactive menu, booking system and refined ambiance.
bistronomic-restaurant.alt: Showcase site for a modern bistronomic restaurant.

massage-courcelles.title: Massage in Courcelles
massage-courcelles.description: A local, mobile-friendly site for a massage therapist based in Courcelles.

finance-site.title: Personal finance site
finance-site.description: A clean and structured site to support users in managing their personal finances.

karate-federation.description: A dynamic, community-driven site for class schedules, events and registrations.

gaming-platform.description: A dark & vibrant world with forums, profiles and news for gamers.
gaming-platform.alt: Immersive interface for a gaming community platform.

sofa-ecommerce.title: Online sofa store

photographer-portfolio.description: A full-page, minimalist portfolio with categorized galleries and fast performance.

timeline.text: First web projects using Joomla and WordPress.
Learned solid foundations in HTML and CSS for clean and structured code.
Advanced in modern JavaScript and first SEO-focused projects to boost visibility.
Adopted React and accessibility principles for more inclusive interfaces.
Explored Next.js to combine performance, SEO and robust server-side architecture.
Used Bootstrap and then Tailwind CSS to design elegant, consistent, responsive UIs.
Integrated Git for version control and added front-end tests using Jasmine.
Improved back-end skills with Java, Spring Boot, MySQL and CI/CD deployment.
Strategic consulting in SEO, advanced accessibility, and custom website design.

philosophy.title: What drives me
philosophy.text1: Offering each client a custom solution, a digital presence that reflects them, and a solid foundation for visibility.
philosophy.text2: Rigor, clarity, listening, and sharing — these are the pillars of my work. My goal is for your site to be a true growth engine, not just a tool.

cta.title: Shall we build your project together?
cta.text: Let’s take a few minutes to discuss it calmly.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: Whether for a request, a specific need or the desire to start a web project, I listen with care. Write to me and let’s build an online presence that reflects you.
